item.title: MLB Announcer Flushes 'Beloved' Broadcast Feature Away In 1 Sweet Sendoff
item.description: The baseball broadcaster refused to dump on the "unforgettable" graphic as he bid farewell to an on-screen "legend."

item.title: Video Of Crazy Tow Truck Incident Goes Viral Because, As Noted, It's Crazy
item.description: A Saab being towed swerved back and forth between various freeway lanes on Houston's I-610 loop.
